name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience in software engineering and architecture design, focusing on performance optimization and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. Proven expertise in leading technical projects and providing technical leadership while fostering collaboration across teams. Adept in data visualization and virtual runtime profiling, I have successfully developed solutions with a strong emphasis on planet-scale streaming and effective data storage engines.

As a versatile Full Stack Developer, I utilize an extensive tech stack, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with proficiency in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I possess a robust understanding of CI/CD processes and DevOps methodologies that support system delivery. With solid experience in microservices architecture and building applications aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, I am committed to delivering high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors. My background also includes developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
- Provided technical leadership in the architecture design of scalable, full-stack healthcare and financial platforms utilizing **TypeScript**, **Python (FastAPI)**, **Node.js**, and modern front-end frameworks such as **React (17-18)**, **Next.js**, and **Vue (3.x)**, maintaining compliance with regulatory standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
- Spearheaded data visualization initiatives by delivering complex financial tools with **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded** to provide real-time insights into transaction trends and operational KPIs.
- Led software engineering efforts in deploying cross-platform mobile applications through **Flutter** and **React Native**, facilitating seamless user experiences across iOS and Android with native module integration leveraging state management techniques such as **Provider** and **Redux**.
- Optimized data storage engines using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, enhancing large-scale data ingestion and querying efficiency, while ensuring high performance and system delivery.
- Established enterprise-level DevOps pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI** for streamlined CI/CD processes, ensuring robust testing and security across both web and API services.
- Developed virtual runtime profiling and performance optimization strategies that significantly improved application response times and system resilience.
- Implemented cloud services using **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and serverless architectures like **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions**, achieving high availability and fault tolerance in microservices architecture.
- Collaborated with data scientists to embed NLP models using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers** into core services via RESTful APIs, enhancing document parsing and anomaly detection capabilities.
- Built MLOps pipelines employing **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow**, ensuring continuous training and versioning of machine learning models across development and production environments.
- Integrated advanced search capabilities into applications with **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, successfully managing millions of structured and unstructured health records and financial documents.
- Established comprehensive test strategies employing **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman**, covering unit, integration, and end-to-end testing across all services to maintain quality assurance.

• Demonstrated **technical leadership** by spearheading the modernization of financial platforms through **architecture design** and implementing a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, resulting in a **30%** increase in system scalability and maintainability.

• Enhanced **data visualization** capabilities by developing dynamic front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to ensure a responsive and high-performance user experience for over **100,000** daily active users.

• Designed and implemented real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, which enabled operations teams to conduct analysis on **over 2 million** transactions daily, improving anomaly detection and actionable insights.

• Leveraged **cloud services** such as **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to create a robust event-driven architecture that allows for real-time processing of financial transactions and alerts, enhancing operational efficiency by **40%**.

• Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from **10+** internal and third-party sources, improving data accessibility and reporting accuracy.

• Implemented **AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems** using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, effectively analyzing transaction patterns to flag suspicious activities with a detection rate improvement of **25%** in banking systems.

• Created machine learning pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, seamlessly integrating model inference into backend services, leading to real-time data processing improvements of **15%**.

• Demonstrated **software engineering** and **architecture design** skills by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Leveraged **DevOps** practices and engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
• Showcased **data storage engine** expertise by utilizing **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and caching frequently accessed resources for performance gains.
• Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to enhance product listings, optimize search relevance, and boost conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data analysis.
• Applied **performance optimization** techniques by implementing **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases.
• Utilized **cloud services** and applied feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes namespaces**, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
• Demonstrated **collaboration** and teamwork while creating responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
• Ensured secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, implementing tokenized transactions and maintaining PCI compliance for sensitive data handling.
• Applied **role-based access control (RBAC)** and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring compliance with **GDPR** and protecting user data across the platform.
